page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Stratford recreation ground,on the banks of the Avon,is the venue for a variety of activities. The playground has recently been rebuilt and it is now a superb playing area. TENNIS: The Stratford tennis club has three hard courts and 4 grass courts. The club house is a listed building You have to be a member and there is coaching every Friday night. BOWLING: The bowling club is open for members only.It is open Monday till Friday. CRICKET: The teams play in local Stratford leagues.Soon the cricket pavilion will be nocked down and rebuilt on top of the squash courts and changing rooms.They practice Monday and Friday nights.PUTTING GREEN:the cost is 35p adults,20p children.There are 18 holes.Stratford leisure centre owns it.
